description: The blazes, burning for several days, also threaten the storage depot for the most dangerous waste.
title: Wildfires 'edge closer to Chernobyl nuclear plant'
title_page: Wildfires 'edge closer to Chernobyl nuclear plant' - BBC News
maintext: Police said the fire had been burning since the weekend of 4 April, after a man set fire to dry grass near the exclusion zone. It has since moved closer to the nuclear plant.
